<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/internal/account/organizations/{organization_id}/signup"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sign up an organization with Orb billing.
Creates or updates the organization's Orb subscription to the Embedded PAYG plan.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"organization_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Organization Id"}},{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
